Objective:

Hone your ninja memory skills by mastering the art of adding fading numbers! As you progress through different levels, the challenge intensifies. Are you ready to become a true ninja mathematician?

Level 1: Beginner - Add 3 Numbers

A set of three numbers will appear on the screen.
Memorize the numbers quickly before they start to fade.
Once the numbers fade, recall and add them together.
Type your answer and press 'Enter' to check if you're correct.
Master this level to unlock the next challenge!

Level 2: Novice - Add 4 Numbers

Get ready for a tougher challenge! Four numbers will flash on the screen.
Memorize all four numbers in the given time.
Watch as the numbers fade away, leaving you to rely on your ninja memory.
Add the numbers together and input your answer to proceed.
Successfully completing this level takes you one step closer to ninja mastery!

Level 3: Amateur - Add 5 Numbers

The stakes are higher as you face five fading numbers this time.
Sharpen your concentration and commit the numbers to memory.
Witness the fading sequence and challenge yourself to calculate the sum.
Input your answer and brace yourself for the next level of ninja arithmetic.
Conquer this level to prove you're on the path to becoming a true math ninja!

Level 4: Expert - Add 6 Numbers

Prepare for the ultimate test of your ninja memory and mathematical prowess.
Six numbers will flash before your eyes - memorize them in the blink of an eye.
As the numbers vanish, rely on your sharpened memory to add them accurately.
Type in your answer and see if you've reached the pinnacle of ninja mathematics.
Completing this level marks you as a true master of the fading numbers challenge!

Tips for Success:

- Stay focused and keep distractions at bay.
- Practice each level until you can effortlessly recall and add the numbers.
- Challenge your friends to see who can achieve the highest level of ninja mastery!

Are you prepared to embark on this mathematical ninja journey? May your memory be as sharp as a ninja's blade!
